page.title: 01CORONETS 1
page.content:
The Coronets Jazz Band is for children from 4 to 18 years old. It is for children with nothing to do in their spare time. Also it's a chance to go places,to make more friends and to enjoy music. Our head trainer is called Mr.J. Nicholson. We have seven trainers altogether. The others are in charge of the banner, Majorettes, Drummers, kazoos and flags. There is another trainer called Mr.A.Chambers. He is in charge of the reserves. Our uniforms are blue, red and black. We wear black busby hats and they have gold chains on them. The Majorettes wear white busby hats and chains. The plumes are white for the black busbies and the plumes are red for the white busbies.
{SARA BOOTH, EMMA GENTRY, KEVIN McGLONE
